name: ulmscl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, universe))

stmt.origin: sylbi(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, universe))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, universe))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, universe))
-| wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(culm, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, universe))

comment: Closure of the base set in a uniform limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)
